sentences.sContent: I took the radio back, and they refunded my money .
sentences.sCn: 我把收音机送回去，他们给我退了款。

synos.tran: 退款；[金融]偿还，[会计]偿还额

remMethod.val: re(向后) + fund(资金) → 给回资金 → 偿付； 退款

trans.tranOther: to give someone their money back, especially because they are not satisfied with the goods or services they have paid for
